bibl.title: Telegram from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 28, 1890

div1.p: Lazear cables that he has arrived safely.

div1.head: Telegram from Jesse W. Lazear to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, May 28, 1890
div1.opener:
Form 2.
POSTAL TELEGRAPH-CABLE COMPANY
IN
CONNECTION.
WITH THE
COMMERCIAL
CABLES
TELEGRAM.
This Company TRANSMITS and DELIVERS messages subject to conditions printed on back of this Blank.
ALBERT B. CHANDLER,
President and General Manager.
JOHN O. STEVENS,
Secretary.
div1.p:
Dated Moville,..........Received at.......903A.....
To Switzer..............May 28th.......1890
325 South Miland
Pittsburg
Safe
